name: CUBE - Bullets - A cube source mod
short_description: Cube - Bullets (working title) Cube - Bullets is a sourcemod for the famous 3d-fps "Cube". New Elements are: new more realistic weapons, other gamemodes, a more humanlike player-model and more models at all.
